event.title: Okarun's Cool Moment
event.description: Okarun displayed incredible speed and reflexes to save Momo from a surprise alien attack.

action.details: Okarun dodged the alien's energy blast in a split second, counterattacked with a powerful kick, and rescued Momo without breaking a sweat.
action.impact: The alien was knocked out, and Okarun's reputation as the group's savior was reinforced.
